Title: The Grymwatch
Legend: Believing themselves to be heroic paladins on a mission of the utmost import, the deluded cannibals of the Grymwatch scrabble forth to tear apart their foes in a flurry of fangs and grasping claws.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single, Unique. Duke Crakmarrow and The Grymwatch must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: BATTALIONSThis warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Mortevell’s Helcourt

Rules.Rule: DESCRIPTIONThe Grymwatch is a unit that has 6 models. Gristlewel, Valreek, the Night’s Herald, the Royal Butcher and Master Talon are each armed with Bone Weapons and Filthy Claws; and the Duke’s Harriers are armed with Fangs.

Rules.Name: Royal Retinue
Rules.Fluff: To the Grymwatch, the Duke is their liege, the one to whom they have pledged their undying fealty.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Roll a dice before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly DUKE CRAKMARROW while he is within 3" of this unit. On a 4+, that wound or mortal wound is allocated to this unit instead of DUKE CRAKMARROW.

Rules.Name: Quest To Slay The Monster
Rules.Fluff: Under the command Duke Crakmarrow, these ghouls believe themselves noble knights charged with slaying a great beast that threatens their kingdom.
Rules.Rule: Quest to Slay the Monster: Add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made by this unit that targets a MONSTER.
